mapper.insert: insert into userboard(uboard_title, uboard_con, user_id, store_id) values(#{uboard_title}, #{uboard_con},#{user_id},#{store_id})
mapper.select: select ifnull(min(uboard_id),0) from userboard where uboard_id>#{uboard_id};
select ifnull(max(uboard_id),0) from userboard where uboard_id < #{uboard_id};
